comment: doing this one to check out the Vienna and see what it brings to the beer.
ps I'm toasting the oats for 30 m or until brown.

Nice. I just did a Brown ale on Sunday. I did not toast the oats though. the one I did will be going into a 57 gallon red wine barrel along with a bunch of other brown ale's. not sure how long he is planing on ageing it?
